Title: Wonder Man
Writer: Don Hartman (screenplay), Melville Shavelson (screenplay), Philip Rapp (screenplay), Jack Jevne (adaptation), Eddie Moran (adaptation), Arthur Sheekman (original story)
Actors: Danny Kaye, Virginia Mayo, Vera-Ellen, Donald Woods
Plot: Boisterous nightclub entertainer Buzzy Bellew was the witness to a murder committed by gangster Ten Grand Jackson. One night, two of Jackson's thugs kill Buzzy and dump his body in the lake at Prospect Park in Brooklyn. Buzzy comes back as a ghost and summons his bookworm twin, Edwin Dingle, to Prospect Park so that he can help the police nail Jackson.
